description: Deletes a usage limit from Amazon Redshift Serverless.

parameters.name: usageLimitId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the usage limit to delete.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The limit amount. If time-based, this amount is in RPUs consumed per hour. If data-based, this amount is in terabytes (TB). The value must be a positive number.

nested_items.name: breachAction
nested_items.description: The action that Amazon Redshift Serverless takes when the limit is reached.

nested_items.name: period
nested_items.description: The time period that the amount applies to. A weekly period begins on Sunday. The default is monthly.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the Amazon Redshift Serverless resource.

nested_items.name: usageLimitArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource associated with the usage limit.

nested_items.name: usageLimitId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the usage limit.

nested_items.name: usageType
nested_items.description: The Amazon Redshift Serverless feature to limit.
